content.value:
Yesterday I announced HACKED - Fixing hacked WordPress site Workshop. 

For details eventbrite.co.uk/e/hacked-fixin…

TLDR;
Join me on the 22nd & 29th of April for 2 sessions on identifying & fixing hacked WordPress sites.

Early bird tickets on sale now.
